basic.blooming: Flowering period April-July, flowering period July-September
basic.color: Green fleshy leaf color, flower color yellow

maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, grows in places with scattered light, strong resistant to shade
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely, if planted in water, need to clean rotted root
